mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_class_balance_sheet ( `year`, current_assets, monetary_capital, notes_accounts_receivable, prepayment, other_receivables, inventory, raw_material, finished_goods, other_current_assets, total_current_assets, noncurrent_assets, long_term_equity_investment, original_value_fixed_assets, accumulated_depreciation, net_value_fixed_assets, fixed_assets_depreciation_reserves, net_fixed_assets, construction_in_process, intangible_assets, making_loans_payments, goodwill, deferred_tax_assets, other_noncurrent_assets, total_noncurrent_assets, total_assets, current_liabilities, short_term_borrowing, notes_accounts_payable, unearned_revenue, payroll_payable, tax_payable, other_payables, noncurrent_liabilities_mature_one_year, other_current_liability, total_current_liability, noncurrent_liability, long_term_loan, bonds_payable, long_term_payable, long_term_compensation_employees, anticipation_liabilities, deferred_income, deferred_income_tax_liabilities, other_noncurrent_liabilities, total_noncurrent_liabilities, total_liability, ownership_interest, capitalization, capital_reserve, earned_surplus, undistributed_profit, total_owners_equity, total_liabilities_equity, return_on_equity, adjusted_sales, class_id ) SELECT `year`, current_assets, monetary_capital, notes_accounts_receivable, prepayment, other_receivables, inventory, raw_material, finished_goods, other_current_assets, total_current_assets, noncurrent_assets, long_term_equity_investment, original_value_fixed_assets, accumulated_depreciation, net_value_fixed_assets, fixed_assets_depreciation_reserves, net_fixed_assets, construction_in_process, intangible_assets, making_loans_payments, goodwill, deferred_tax_assets, other_noncurrent_assets, total_noncurrent_assets, total_assets, current_liabilities, short_term_borrowing, notes_accounts_payable, unearned_revenue, payroll_payable, tax_payable, other_payables, noncurrent_liabilities_mature_one_year, other_current_liability, total_current_liability, noncurrent_liability, long_term_loan, bonds_payable, long_term_payable, long_term_compensation_employees, anticipation_liabilities, deferred_income, deferred_income_tax_liabilities, other_noncurrent_liabilities, total_noncurrent_liabilities, total_liability, ownership_interest, capitalization, capital_reserve, earned_surplus, undistributed_profit, total_owners_equity, total_liabilities_equity, return_on_equity, adjusted_sales, #{classId} FROM t_conf_balance_sheet
